abstract: I was watching your videos for weeks because I planned to come to Paris. And today just randomly as I was in the metro I saw you on the street filming. I recognize you. Paris is small. 😆
They will be watching The 20 for years. It’s a perfect tool for people planning a visit

If Jay will permit me a few extra details!
Inside the lovely Gare de Lyon is the Galérie des Fresques (the Fresco Gallery) which contains some stunning paintings of the destinations served from the train station.  The Gare de Lyon was the Paris terminus of the Paris, Lyon, Mediterranean railway (before nationalisation) - you get the picture - some of most glorious railway destinations in France wonderfully illustrated on the walls of the Galérie - well worth popping in.

Bang opposite the station is the restaurant L'Européen with its hall of mirrors interior somewhere between Art Nouveau and Art Déco - it's quite the Parisian dining experience especially if you like seafood (try the oysters).
